input.sentences: every year the smith family host the best halloween party in the city .
mr. smith dresses up and tries to scare his guests .
his son [male] | prefers what he considers cool costumes to scary ones .
uh-oh | it looks like uncle [male] had a little too much to drink again .
at the end of the night the guests always like to pose for pictures with the smith twins .
output.sentences: The DJ played the first song for me at the Halloween party.
I was dressed as a monstrous priest.
Bill's costume was pieced together to make him a fighter pilot.
Alice and John came as a hooker and cop.
The party is over till next year.
